00037 #define __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC   __cdecl
00038 #else
00039 #define __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC

00041 
00044 void * __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC scalable_malloc (size_t size);
00045 
00048 void   __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC scalable_free (void* ptr);
00049 
00052 void * __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC scalable_realloc (void* ptr, size_t size);
00053 
00056 void * __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC scalable_calloc (size_t nobj, size_t size);

00062 #ifdef __cplusplus
00063 
00064 #include <new>      /* To use new with the placement argument */
00065 
00066 namespace tbb {
00067 
00069 
00072 template<typename T>
00073 class scalable_allocator {
00074 public:
00075     typedef T* pointer;
00076     typedef const T* const_pointer;
00077     typedef T& reference;
00078     typedef const T& const_reference;
00079     typedef T value_type;
00080     typedef size_t size_type;
00081     typedef ptrdiff_t difference_type;
00082     template<class U> struct rebind {
00083         typedef scalable_allocator<U> other;
00084     };
00085 
00086     scalable_allocator() throw() {}
00087     scalable_allocator( const scalable_allocator& ) throw() {}
00088     template<typename U> scalable_allocator(const scalable_allocator<U>&) throw() {}
00089 
00090     pointer address(reference x) const {return &x;}
00091     const_pointer address(const_reference x) const {return &x;}
00092 
00094     pointer allocate( size_type n, const void* /*hint*/ =0 ) {
00095         return static_cast<pointer>( scalable_malloc( n * sizeof(value_type) ) );
00096     }
00097 
00099     void deallocate( pointer p, size_type ) {
00100         scalable_free( p );
00101     }
00102 
00104     size_type max_size() const throw() {
00105         size_type absolutemax = static_cast<size_type>(-1) / sizeof (T);
00106         return (absolutemax > 0 ? absolutemax : 1);
00107     }
00108     void construct( pointer p, const T& val ) { new(static_cast<void*>(p)) T(val); }
00109     void destroy( pointer p ) {(static_cast<T*>(p))->~T();}
00110 };
00111 
00113 
00114 template<>
00115 class scalable_allocator<void> {
00116 public:
00117     typedef void* pointer;
00118     typedef const void* const_pointer;
00119     typedef void value_type;
00120     template<class U> struct rebind {
00121         typedef scalable_allocator<U> other;
00122     };
00123 };
00124 
00125 template<typename T, typename U>
00126 inline bool operator==( const scalable_allocator<T>&, const scalable_allocator<U>& ) {return true;}
00127 
00128 template<typename T, typename U>
00129 inline bool operator!=( const scalable_allocator<T>&, const scalable_allocator<U>& ) {return false;}
00130 
00131 } // namespace tbb
